meanings.meaning_en_US: The natural agent that stimulates sight and makes things visible.

examples.sentence: The sun provides natural [light].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽提供自然光

examples.sentence: We need more [light] in this room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要這個房間更多的光

examples.sentence: The stars shine at night, providing [light].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 星星在夜裡閃耀，提供了光

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having little weight; not heavy.

examples.sentence: This box is very [light].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個箱子很輕

examples.sentence: She wore a [light] jacket in the spring.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在春天穿了一件輕的外套

examples.sentence: He prefers a [light] meal in the evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡晚上吃一頓輕的飯

meanings.meaning_en_US: Achieved without great effort; presenting few difficulties.

examples.sentence: This problem is [easy] to solve.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個問題很容易解決。

examples.sentence: She finds math [easy] compared to science.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她認為數學比科學容易。

examples.sentence: The test was [easy] for her.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次考試對她來說很簡單。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a relaxed or gentle manner.

examples.sentence: He took the challenge [easy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他輕鬆地接受了挑戰。

examples.sentence: She passed [easy] in the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在考試中輕鬆通過了。

examples.sentence: You can do this [easy] if you believe in yourself.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你相信自己，你可以輕易做到這一點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visual representation of something, typically created by a camera or artist.

examples.sentence: She framed the [picture] of her family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她把全家福的圖片裝裱起來。

examples.sentence: This [picture] captures the moment perfectly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張圖片完美地捕捉了那一刻。

examples.sentence: He drew a [picture] of his dog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他畫了牠的狗的圖片。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Able to be done; within the power or capacity of someone or something.

examples.sentence: It is [possible] to finish the project ahead of schedule.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 提前完成專案是可能的。

examples.sentence: Are there any [possible] solutions to this problem?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 對這個問題有可能的解決方案嗎？

examples.sentence: We will explore [possible] options.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將探索可能的選項。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of time lasting approximately 30 days.

examples.sentence: Her birthday is in the next [month].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的生日在下個月份。

examples.sentence: Each [month] has its own significance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個月份都有其特殊意義。

examples.sentence: We meet once a [month].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們每個月見一次。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A fixed luminous point in the night sky which is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.

examples.sentence: You can see many [stars] in the sky tonight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你今晚可以在天空中看到許多星星。

examples.sentence: The [stars] are brighter in the countryside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在鄉下，星星更亮。

examples.sentence: She wants to be a [star] in the movies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想成為電影明星。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The time or a period of time following the moment of speaking or writing.

examples.sentence: We need to think about the [future].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要考慮未來。

examples.sentence: In the [future], technology will be different.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在未來，技術將會有所不同。

examples.sentence: She hopes for a bright [future].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她希望擁有光明的未來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A continuous area or expanse that is free, available, or unoccupied.

examples.sentence: There is enough [space] for everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人都有足夠的空間。

examples.sentence: She needs more [space] to work effectively.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她需要更多的空間來有效地工作。

examples.sentence: The garden provides a lovely [space] for relaxation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個花園提供了一個可供放鬆的美好空間。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The terminal part of the upper limb in humans and primates.

examples.sentence: He raised his [hand] to ask a question.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他舉手想問問題。

examples.sentence: She has a tattoo on her [hand].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的手上有一個纹身。

examples.sentence: Can you lend me a [hand] with this?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能幫我一下嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: The star at the center of our solar system.

examples.sentence: The [sun] rises in the east.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽從東方升起。

examples.sentence: They enjoyed the warm [sun].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們享受著溫暖的太陽。

examples.sentence: The [sun] set behind the mountains.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽在山後落下。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An assembly of people for discussion or decision making.

examples.sentence: The [meeting] is scheduled for 10 AM.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議定於上午10點舉行。

examples.sentence: She prepared notes for the [meeting].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為會議準備了筆記。

examples.sentence: They had a productive [meeting] last week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們上週舉行了一次有效的會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Begin to be.

examples.sentence: He hopes to [become] a doctor one day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他希望有一天能成為醫生。

examples.sentence: She will [become] the team leader next year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她明年將成為團隊領袖。

examples.sentence: The weather can [become] quite unpredictable.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 天氣可能會變得相當不可預測。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The feeling of wanting to know or learn about something or someone.

examples.sentence: She has a deep [interest] in science.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對科學有深厚的興趣。

examples.sentence: My [interest] in music began at a young age.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我對音樂的興趣始於年幼時。

examples.sentence: He expressed an [interest] in learning new languages.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他表達了學習新語言的興趣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A young human being below the age of puberty.

examples.sentence: Every [child] deserves a loving family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個孩子都值得擁有一個充滿愛的家庭

examples.sentence: The park was filled with [children].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公園裡充滿了孩子

examples.sentence: She wants to become a [child] psychologist.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想成為一名兒童心理學家

meanings.meaning_en_US: A son or daughter of any age.

examples.sentence: She is the only [child] in the family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是家裡唯一的子女

examples.sentence: They raised their [children] with care.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們細心地養活他們的子女

examples.sentence: A [child] can also refer to a descendant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 子女也可以指後代

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have or retain possession of.

examples.sentence: Please [keep] your voice down.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請保持你的聲音小點。

examples.sentence: I want to [keep] this wonderful memory forever.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想永遠保留這個美好的回憶。

examples.sentence: She decided to [keep] the secret.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定保守這個秘密。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To come or go into a place.

examples.sentence: Please [enter] your username and password.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請輸入您的用戶名和密碼

examples.sentence: You must [enter] the building through the main door.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你必須通過正門進入大樓

examples.sentence: They will [enter] the competition next week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將在下週參加比賽

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have or use something in common with others.

examples.sentence: I will [share] this cake with you.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會和你分享這個蛋糕。

examples.sentence: They decided to [share] their resources.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定分享他們的資源。

examples.sentence: Can we [share] the information?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以分享這個資訊嗎？
